description: MainActivity.kt defines the primary activity for an Android TV application, managing fragment transactions for different UI screens such as Home, Search, VideoDetails, and Player. It implements interfaces from each fragment to facilitate navigation and playback control.
published: playVideoWithContext(video: Video, resumePositionMs: Long, rowKey: String, rowVideoIds: ArrayList<String>, currentIndex: Int)

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class that manages the UI screens for the Android TV app, handling navigation between fragments and user interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and loads the HomeFragment if starting fresh.

methods.name: openDetails
methods.description: Navigates to the VideoDetailsFragment to show details of a selected video.

methods.name: playVideo
methods.description: Starts video playback, optionally with a resume position or context.

methods.name: playVideoWithContext
methods.description: Plays a video with additional context such as row key, list of video IDs, and current index.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Handles back navigation, closing current fragment or finishing the activity if no more back stack.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Overrides default back press to perform custom back navigation.
